name: YHUK™ Medical Protective Coveralls Type 5

overview.title: YHUK™ Medical Protective Coveralls Type 5
overview.text: YHUK™ Medical Protective Coverall Type 5 is a high-end PE coated spunbond non-woven materials, through cutting and sewing into thickened hooded bodysuits, leaving openings around the face, wrists and ankles, no waist tightening so that doctors can move freely.

specifications.value: S-160CM, M-165CM, L-170CM, XL-175CM, XXL-180CM, XXXL-185CM

EN 14126, EN 13982 
ISO 13982-1&2
AAMI PB-70
MDD 93/42/EEC Class I & 2007/47/EC Standard

productDetail:
YHUK Medical Protective Coveralls Type 5

The product can be used in places with a higher level of protection e.g. ICU Isolation Approach.
The product conforms to EN 14126 and EN 13982 and is certified by 'TUV SUD'.
The factory is certified by China National Medical Products Administration (NMPA).
The factory is certified for EN ISO 13485: 2016 by 'TUV SUD'.
The factory was founded in 2012.
